code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Discipline from"./Discipline";import Country from"./Country";import Result from"./Result";import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Form(){const[page,setPage]=useState(0);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({discipline:"",country:""});const FormTitles=["Discipline","Country","Result"];const PageDisplay=()=>{if(page===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Discipline,{formData:formData,setFormData:setFormData});}else if(page===1){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Country,{formData:formData,setFormData:setFormData});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Result,{formData:formData,setFormData:setFormData});}};const progressPercentage=(page+1)/FormTitles.length*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progressbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:page===0?"33.3%":page===1?"66.6%":"100%"}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-titles",children:FormTitles[page]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"body",children:PageDisplay()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:page==0,onClick:()=>{setPage(currPage=>currPage-1);},children:"Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:page==FormTitles.length-1,onClick:()=>{setPage(currPage=>currPage+1);},children:"Next"})]})]});}export default Form;
